mapper.select: select c.id as key, c.column_name || '｜' || c.column_typename || '｜' || COALESCE(c.column_comment, '') as label from db_table_column c, model_info m, db_table t where m.id = #{modelId} and m.table_id = t.id and t.id = c.table_id

select d.db_type,c.id,c.column_name,c.column_comment,c.column_typename,c.column_type,c.column_precision,c.column_scale, c.column_default,c.sort,c.is_primary,c.is_notnull,c.is_increment from db_table_column c, db_info d, db_table t where c.table_id = #{tableId} and c.table_id = t.id and t.db_id = d.id order by c.sort

select d.db_type,c.id,c.table_id,c.column_name,c.column_comment,c.column_typename,c.column_type,c.column_precision, c.column_default,c.sort,c.is_primary,c.is_notnull,c.is_increment from db_table_column c, db_info d, db_table t where c.id = #{id} and c.table_id = t.id and t.db_id = d.id
